title: GetAlarmIDName (Function)
text:
FUNCTION GetAlarmIDName : STRING
This function gets the ID the user entered in the AlarmGroup for a given Alarm
If the alarm can not be found an empty string is returned.

rows.Name: uiAlarmId
rows.Comment:
The (internal) AlarmID that can f.i. be retrieved via the selected variable at the
alarm table

rows:
The name of the AlarmGroup that can f.i. be retrieved via the selected variable at the
alarm table
